DOC.brief_title: Acute Caffeine Effects Cardiac Autonomic Cardiorespiratory Parameters Responses After Aerobic Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: The experimental procedure divide three phase , perform treadmill , minimum interval 48 hour , order allow adequate recovery participant . Before start first stage experimental protocol control anthropometric measurement carry , body weight digital scale ( Plenna , TIN 00139 MAXIMA , Brazil ) ) , use stadiometer ( Plenna , TIN 00139 MAXIMA , Brazil ) ) . The protocol : I ) Maximum stress test protocol : assessment maximum oxygen consumption ( VO2max ) treadmill ( Inbrasport / Millennium ) , use Bruce protocol . II ) Control Protocol ( PC ) : stage volunteer ingest compress form placebo similar Protocol III remain rest 15 minute supine position , follow 30 minute aerobic exercise treadmill , 5 minute speed 6.0 km / h follow 25 minute 60 % VO2max final 60 minute lie recovery . III ) Experimental protocol ( PE ) : In stage , volunteer perform activity similar PC , make tablet intake consist 300mg caffeine , value within maximum daily amount allow FDA .
